mapper.sql: s_id, send_member_type, member_id, employee_id, theme, service_time, service_project_name, topic_time, store_id, is_sms, is_deleted
mapper.insert: insert into service_plan_info (s_id, send_member_type, member_id, employee_id, theme, service_time, service_project_name, topic_time, store_id, is_sms, is_deleted) values (#{sId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sendMemberType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{theme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{serviceProjectName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{topicTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isSms,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into service_plan_info
s_id,
send_member_type,
member_id,
employee_id,
theme,
service_time,
service_project_name,
topic_time,
store_id,
is_sms,
is_deleted,

mapper.update:
update service_plan_info
send_member_type = #{sendMemberType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
employee_id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
theme = #{theme,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
service_time = #{serviceTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
service_project_name = #{serviceProjectName,jdbcType=CHAR},
topic_time = #{topicTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_sms = #{isSms,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where s_id = #{sId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update service_plan_info set send_member_type = #{sendMemberType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, employee_id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, theme = #{theme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service_time = #{serviceTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, service_project_name = #{serviceProjectName,jdbcType=CHAR}, topic_time = #{topicTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_sms = #{isSms,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER} where s_id = #{sId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT epi.name,spi.s_id, spi.send_member_type, spi.member_id, spi.employee_id, spi.theme, spi.service_time, spi.service_project_name, spi.topic_time, spi.store_id, spi.is_sms, spi.is_deleted, CASE WHEN send_member_type = 1 THEN (SELECT ml.level_name FROM member_level ml WHERE ml.level_id = spi.member_id) WHEN send_member_type = 2 THEN (SELECT ms.screening_name FROM member_screening ms WHERE ms.screening_id = spi.member_id) END AS member_name FROM service_plan_info spi LEFT JOIN employee_info epi ON epi.employee_id = spi.employee_id WHERE 1=1 and spi.store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
